## ‚ùì FAQs (Prepare for these)

**Q: Why accelerate from 30 days to 7 days?**
A: Competitive window. By Q2 2026, international competitors will enter Spanish market. We need 300+ members + testimonials by May to be defensible. First-mover advantage is everything.

**Q: Why emphasize Claude Code over OpenClaw?**
A: OpenClaw has real security issues (18k devices exposed, 15% malicious skills). VirusTotal partnership + HN "Security-Risk Patterns" trending = market is aware. We position Claude Code as the safe alternative.

**Q: What if competition enters before we're ready?**
A: Unlikely because: (1) Spanish market is niche, (2) language barrier, (3) we build community not just course (stickier). By May, we'll have testimonials + social proof = defensible.

**Q: Isn't 47‚Ç¨ expensive?**
A: No. Reddit shows "$12k/mes from 100 YT views" = market wants QUALITY not cheap. 47‚Ç¨ signals "this is premium education" not commodity. It works.

**Q: What about Santi's time commitment?**
A: 4h VSL recording (one-time). Then 3-4h/week support (manageable with Discord bot + peer support). By month 2, should stabilize to 2h/week.
